channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump blurts out expletive as he lashes out at Israel and Iran over ceasefire
item.description: President Trump blurted out an expletive as he aired frustration with Israel and Iran, accusing both nations of violating a ceasefire agreement.

item.title: Temperature in New York City reaches 100 degrees as eastern US swelters under extreme heat wave
item.description: The temperature in New York City has reached 100 degrees as the eastern U.S. sweltered under an extreme heat wave.

item.title: How prepared are American forces for attacks from Iran?
item.description: CBS News Pentagon reporter Eleanor Watson has the latest on U.S. military movements amid the shaky ceasefire agreement between Israel and Iran.

item.description: Federal prosecutors on Tuesday rested their case in the sex-trafficking and racketeering conspiracy trial of Sean "Diddy" Combs.

item.title: Trump attends NATO summit as Iran overshadows agenda
item.description: The NATO summit follows a U.S. operation striking Iranian nuclear sites — and the announcement by President Trump of a ceasefire.
